extendedInfo.description: This is a donate version of Simply 8-Bit! This version features more custom icons!If you like my work, please consider donating!This is not a standalone app, you will need a compatible launcher that supports custom icon packs. Compatible with Apex Launcher, Nova Launcher, ADW Launcher, and Holo Launcher. For other launchers, get Desktop Visualizer to apply icons on the homescreen: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.bii.android.app.dskvzr(more details below)To use this icon pack:First install Apex / Nova / ADW / Holo Launcher (all free from the Play Store). Then proceed to download and install this icon pack.Find Simply 8-Bit in the launcher's theme settings, then click apply.Manual selection of icons / Icon picker is only supported on Apex and Nova.Features:450+ icons and counting!8-bit themed wallpapers!Even more 8-bit custom icons for compatible launcher!Optimized for XHDPI (720p) devices!Go to http://simplyeightbit.tumblr.com/ for more details!To apply custom icons:Apex Launcher and Nova Launcher Prime: Long press and release icon shortcut that is already placed on homescreen > Press Edit > Press on the app icon > Select (from) Icon Pack > Select Simply 8-Bit > Choose the icon you want.Desktop Visualizer: at the DVR setup screen > Press Select Icon > Select Others > Select Simply 8-Bit > Choose the icon. (Custom icons are located at the end of the list)To apply the wallpapers you'll need Apex Launcher installed, otherwise get them from http://bit.ly/Simply8BitWallpapersI take icon requests, so if you have an app icon to be themed, please feel free to make the request by filling up this form! http://bit.ly/Simply8BitRequestIf you have any questions/comments/concerns/ideas then please contact me via j3nnning@gmail.comDon't forget to rate and please leave a review!

reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
reviews.comment: These are the icons I was looking for. They\'re really great. There\'s only one problem, 450 icons are not enough. Please make more! I bought the donation version to help you. Good luck!
reviews.author: Mohammed Al-Sherif

reviews.title: Great icons, please add more!
reviews.comment: This gorgeous retro icon pack really needs more icons! Please add more :)
reviews.author: Marcell L\303\251vai

reviews.title: Retro beauty.
reviews.comment: Absolutely love this icon pack. Its beautiful in its simplicity and takes me back to the good old days of my youth. Wish it had more icons... But bought the donate version to support the dev. Keep it updated please!! :)
reviews.author: Joseph Skoufes

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love the icon packs I own both,  need more icons though,  a lot missing
reviews.author: joshua warren

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: I would really like to be able to view all the icons but it isn\'t letting me could we get some help?
reviews.author: Anthony Calvi
